feed.title: Actual AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't process split transaction parent by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/110

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.4.4...1.4.5

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.5.0 Allow to create your own prompt
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow to specify your own template by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/112
  • Bump ai from 4.0.31 to 4.0.40 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/111
  • Bump @ai-sdk/openai from 1.0.16 to 1.0.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/108
  • Bump @ai-sdk/google from 1.0.14 to 1.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/113

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.4.5...1.5.0

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.6.0 Actual Tags support
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use tags for guessed / missed transactions | Migrate old notes to tags by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.5.0...1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • LLM should choose from enum categories ID, so prompt can be simplified by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/115

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.6.0...1.7.0

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.7.1
entry.content:
Fix for https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/issues/121

What's Changed

  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.19.1 to 8.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/120
  • Bump ai from 4.0.40 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/119
  • Bump ollama-ai-provider from 1.1.0 to 1.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/118
  • Bump @ai-sdk/openai from 1.0.18 to 1.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/116
  • Bugfix/not all providers supports enum generation by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/122
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.19.1 to 8.21.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/125
  • Bump ai from 4.1.0 to 4.1.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/123
  • Bump @ai-sdk/openai from 1.1.0 to 1.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/124

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.7.0...1.7.1
